deposit.title: Deposit Funds
deposit.step1: Click the button below to open the CryptoBot deposit page.
deposit.step2: Send the amount you want to deposit.
deposit.step3: Take a screenshot of the payment confirmation.
deposit.step4: Send the screenshot to our Telegram bot.
deposit.step5: Our team will verify and approve your deposit within 1 hour.
deposit.support_info: If you need assistance, contact support at
deposit.login_required: You must log in to deposit funds.

mines_game.treasure_instruction:
Treasure Hunt:
Find the gems to win big!
mines_game.bomb_instruction:
Avoid the mines
to keep your winnings!

instructions.title: Game Instructions
instructions.description: The amount of mines affects the multiplier on your bet. The more mines, the higher your potential winnings!
instructions.treasure: Treasure Hunt: Find the gems to win big!
instructions.bomb: Avoid the mines to keep your winnings!

withdraw_section.title: Withdraw Funds
withdraw_section.step1: Enter the amount you want to withdraw.
withdraw_section.step3: Click "Request Withdrawal" to submit your request.
withdraw_section.step4: Your request will be reviewed by our admin.
withdraw_section.step5: Once approved, funds will be sent to your Crypto Bot.
withdraw_section.note1: Make sure your Crypto Bot username is correct.
withdraw_section.note2: Withdrawals may take up to 24 hours to process.
withdraw_section.note3: You can check your withdrawal in Telegram bot.

login.switch_to_login: Already have an account? Log In

home_description: Experience our exciting games and win big!
